# THE ADVENTURE MOTORCYCLE CLUB

Join the Club

## Who We Are

Backcountry Expeditions is an exclusive Adventure Motorcycle Club with a
unique membership of ADV enthusiasts. The ADV Moto Club delivers four
fantastic riding opportunities for its members throughout each year, with one
being run overseas. All rides are planned and supported to ensure the very
best experience for all riders taking part.

### Why a Club?

Between 2017 and 2023 we ran tours and training opportunities but quickly
reached capacity as demand increased. In our experience, too many incompatible
riders undermines a great riding experience. We’ve found that combining a
group of likeminded riders alongside an epic location, at the right time of
year, on a well planned route is the secret to success. The ADV Moto Club
brings riders together with a bond and similar approach to their ADV riding
ambitions.

### How does it work?

Membership numbers are capped to guarantee we can maintain and deliver the
highest standards of any riding experience. Club members have access to four
riding opportunities each year, timed to allow plenty of opportunity for
variety. All ride planning, delivery and support is provided by the ADV Moto
Club. Riders either use their own motorcycle or rent one through our partners.
The Club also provides a logistical service that picks up, delivers and
returns members' motorcycles to ride locations.

Backcountry Expeditions goes above and beyond again and again to make sure the
client is taken care of and has the best experience!  

Klaus L

Join the Club

### Our Experience

Prior to the formation of Backcountry Expeditions in 2017, our two- and four-
wheel expeditionary experience was honed in a military context. With over 21
years experience in planning and delivering global operations, we turned our
attention to training and running tours in the western United States. Between
2017 and 2023, we successfully delivered more than 100 motorcycle expeditions
covering 500,000+ miles of off-road adventures. We now focus our attention on
running the best ADV Moto Club for our members.

### Should I consider joining?

The ADV Moto Club is limited in numbers to protect the experience of all our
members, but we are always looking for applicants to join when a place becomes
available. If you have the time, knowledge, experience and inclination to plan
your own ADV rides, then this might not be for you. But if you're looking for
an organization to provide four great riding opportunities each year, with the
knowledge that safety and support is assured, and that you’ll be in the
company of like minded riders, then we invite you to apply.

Neil is a true professional who delivers a unique and exciting experience.
Highly recommended!!!  

Matthew B

## Apply to Join the ADV Moto Club

Great adventure riding experiences depend on the motorcycle, location,
weather, planning & most importantly, the other riders involved. It is our
goal to maintain a membership of respectful and considerate riders.  
  
You don’t have to be the best ADV rider, but you do have to be a team player.
Put simply, overly demanding and inconsiderate riders need not apply.
